directions: Combine red kidney beans, green beans, and garbanzo beans in a large bowl. Add onion, garlic, sugar, Italian seasoning, rice wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, and olive oil; stir to coat. Season with salt. Marinate salad in refrigerator before serving, at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans red kidney beans, drained
2 (15 ounce) cans cut green beans, drained
1/4 cup olive oil, or more if needed
title: Bob's Three Bean Salad
